name: StarfieldClock
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: starfield clock
des:
Transform your Echo Show into a captivating timepiece with "Sternzeit," the Alexa Skill that redefines time display!

Experience precise, second-accurate timekeeping against an animated starry sky, enveloped in a calming ambiance with gentle lighting effects.

Ideal for:

Moments of relaxation
Meditation
Unique décor
Note: Echo Show with screen required. No sounds or music.

Get "Sternzeit" now and discover a new dimension of timekeeping!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
